ProjectCards.Title: Kingslayer
ProjectCards.description: Kingslayer is a video game made in Godot with a mix of gdscript and C#. This was a group project and can be found on Github.

ProjectCards.Title: Tic Tac Toe
ProjectCards.description: A tic tac toe game with an ai that will play you, and always win or tie. This was made with react.

ProjectCards.Title: Slapshot Training Packs
ProjectCards.description: A Game mod made to add training packs for the players of slapshot made with C# making use of .Net dll's

ProjectCards.Title: Snakob Hippo Mod
ProjectCards.description: A game mod that adds tons of hippos in the game by request of Snakob to showcase the ability to add custom models into slapshot

ProjectCards.Title: Slapshot Modding Utils
ProjectCards.description: A utility to aid in getting your custom models into your slapshot mod.

ProjectCards.Title: React-Craft
ProjectCards.description: My first game made in javascript with react.
